mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EMP_COMMUTE WHERE EMP_ID=#{empId} AND to_char( EMP_COMMUTE_WORKDATE, 'yyyymmdd' ) = to_char( sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')
mapper.update: UPDATE EMP_COMMUTE SET EMP_COMMUTE_STARTTIME = SYSDATE, EMP_COMMUTE_STATUS = '외근중' WHERE EMP_ID= #{empId} AND to_char( EMP_COMMUTE_WORKDATE, 'yyyymmdd' ) = to_char( sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')
UPDATE EMP_COMMUTE SET EMP_COMMUTE_ENDTIME = SYSDATE, EMP_COMMUTE_STATUS = '근무중' WHERE EMP_ID= #{empId} AND to_char( EMP_COMMUTE_WORKDATE, 'yyyymmdd' ) = to_char( sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')
UPDATE EMP_COMMUTE SET EMP_COMMUTE_CLOCKOUT = SYSDATE, EMP_COMMUTE_STATUS = '퇴근' WHERE EMP_ID= #{empId} AND to_char( EMP_COMMUTE_WORKDATE, 'yyyymmdd' ) = to_char( sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')
